Main Class Services
*You cannot change get a new Main if you have it as a SubClass or if it is already your atual Main class.
*You cannot change get a new Main if you are a Olympiad Hero.
*All your Olympiad data will be deleted!
*All your dye's will be removed and skills will be reseted to +0.
*Changing to a Kamael class as non Kamael will delete all your subclasses (vice-versa aswell!).
